sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"假装"之意。
means: feign常和pretend换用，一般指言行上的"装做，假装"如装无知、悲哀；装死、疯或装做睡眠等。
pretend ： 指公开表示的与心里想的与客观实际不符合，含公开承认其虚假的意味。
simulate ： 主要指模仿他人或他物的样子，假装具有他人或他物的特点。

sentence.Network_en: The children pretend to be different animals dancing to the music.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们扮成不同的动物，随着音乐起舞。

sentence.Network_en: We won't pretend we savour the prospect of a month in prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不会装作我们满心盼望着在监狱中度过一个月。

sentence.Network_en: It would be idle to pretend the system is perfect.
sentence.Network_cn: 假装系统完美无疵是徒劳的。

伪装的英文是什么？_百度知道 ... pretend vt. 假装, 装扮, (作为藉口或理由)伪称 Pretend 伪装 Pretender 伪装者.
伪装的英文是什么？_百度知道 ... pose vi. 摆姿势, 佯装, 矫揉造作 pretend vt. 假装, 装扮, (作为藉口或理由)伪称 Pretend 伪装.

pretend you never went to school ., 假装你没上过学.
装扮游戏(pretend play)：幼儿常会假扮成某一人物，在将一些道具看成与角色有关的物件，以搭配自己所装扮的角色。Piaget认为装 …
而假装游戏（Pretend Play）是其中一个最核心也是争论最多的一个话题， 以往对假装游戏的研究表明假装游戏在儿童的认知方面、 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin praetendere 'stretch forth, claim', from prae 'before' + tendere 'stretch'. The adjective dates from the early 20th cent

entry.def: If you pretend that something is the case, you act in a way that is intended to make people believe that it is the case, although in fact it is not.

example.ex: I pretend that things are really okay when they're not...
example.tran: 当情况不好的时候我假装一切顺利。

example.ex: Sometimes the boy pretended to be asleep...
example.tran: 有时这个男孩会假装睡着了。

entry.def: If children or adults pretend that they are doing something, they imagine that they are doing it, for example as part of a game.

example.ex: She can sunbathe and pretend she's in Spain...
example.tran: 她可以晒晒太阳，假装自己是在西班牙。

example.ex: The children pretend to be different animals dancing to the music.
example.tran: 孩子们扮成不同的动物，随着音乐起舞。

entry.def: If you do not pretend that something is the case, you do not claim that it is the case.

example.ex: We do not pretend that the past six years have been without problems for us...
example.tran: 我们并不自夸在过去的6年中没有遇到任何问题。

example.ex: Within this lecture I cannot pretend to deal adequately with dreams.
example.tran: 在这一次讲座中，我不敢自诩能对梦境作透彻的分析。

means.word_mean: 1. make believe with the intent to deceive;
3. put forward a claim and assert right or possession of;
4. put forward, of a guess, in spite of possible refutation;

sentences.sentence: "I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again"
"I cannot pretend to say that you are wrong"

means.word_mean: 5. represent fictitiously, as in a play, or pretend to be or act like;

sentences.sentence: "He professed innocence but later admitted his guilt"
"She pretended not to have known the suicide bomber"
"She pretends to be an expert on wine"
"dangling their legs in the water to catch pretend fish"

auth_sentence.content: No pretend hero was more exhilarating than Douglas Fairbanks.
auth_sentence.res_content: No pretend hero was more exhilarating than Douglas Fairbanks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No pretend hero was more exhilarating than Douglas Fairbanks.

auth_sentence.content: You look out the window Or pretend to fidget.
auth_sentence.res_content: You look out the window Or pretend to fidget.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You look out the window Or pretend to fidget.

auth_sentence.content: Pretend that you are the Voice of the People.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pretend that you are the Voice of the People.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pretend that you are the Voice of the People.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图

stems_affixes.value_cn: 嫩的, 温柔的, 软弱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向+er→像伸出的幼芽→嫩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: attend[v.出席,参加]+ance表名词→n.出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
attend[v.出席,参加]+ant人→n.服务员;随从,随员
intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图
tend趋向+ency表名词→n.趋势,趋向;倾向
at加强+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→出席
con一起+tend伸展,趋向→一起伸展→竞争,斗争

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长,延伸;扩充;给予;提供;估价
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→扩张
in内+tend伸展,趋向→内心伸出→想要

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装,假托,借口,[在演戏中]装扮
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先,提前+tend伸展,趋向→提前展开,事先展开→假装,借口
pro前+tend伸展,趋向→v.[使]伸出, [使]伸展

stems_affixes.value_cn: 趋向,往往是;易于,往往会;照料,看护
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向→趋向做→易于,往往会

Sentence.sentence: You can pretend that you don't like things which you are actually quite pleased about.
Or you can pretend to like things which you are quite happy to do without

sentences.en: So you don't need to pretend, do you?
sentences.cn: 所以你不必装假了, 对吧?

sentences.en: They pretended that they were tourists.

jushi.english: The time has come to stop pretending.
He wasn't really crying; he was only pretending.
jushi.chinese: 他并不是真的在哭,他只是装装样子。

jushi.english: She pretended,I believe, like she was poor and desperate.
jushi.chinese: 我相信她是假装的,好像她是又贫穷又绝望的。
